remarks: Value of the function ` G ` that gives the sequence of monomials of a power series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)
statement:
pser.g $e |- G = ( x e. CC |-> ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( A ` n ) x. ( x ^ n ) ) ) ) $.
pserval2 $p |- ( ( X e. CC /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( ( G ` X ) ` N ) = ( ( A ` N ) x. ( X ^ N ) ) ) $.
$d A n x $.
$d N n $.
